name: tdwg-theme
description: A Pelican theme for the TDWG website

scripts.wipe:static: mkdir -p static && rm -rf static/* && mkdir static/css && mkdir static/js && mkdir static/fonts
scripts.copy:bootstrap-js: cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js static/js/jquery.min.js && cp node_modules/popper.js/dist/umd/popper.min.js static/js/popper.min.js && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js static/js/bootstrap.min.js
scripts.build:all: npm run wipe:static && npm run copy:src && npm run copy:custom-js && npm run copy:bootstrap-js && npm run copy:font-awesome && npm run create:css
